bug.author: Nacional-okmr
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>System Configuration</denchmark-h>
Windows 10 Pro Visual Studio 2015 CUDA 8.0 cuDNN 5.1 Graphic card:Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 <denchmark-h:h3>Issue summary</denchmark-h>
I installed OpenPose as described in the instructions(doc/installation.md). I compiled, but I can't execute OpenPoseDemo.exe with error. <denchmark-h:h3>Executed command (if any)</denchmark-h>
As described in the instructions.
In order to verify OpenPose is working, try compiling and executing the demo: 1. Right click on OpenPoseDemo --> Set as StartUp Project. 2. Change Debug by Release mode. 3. Compile it and run it with F5 or the green play icon.
<denchmark-h:h3>OpenPose output (if any)</denchmark-h>
This is an output on VisualStudio(Translated). Exception thrown at 0x00007FFE5DBC0372 (OpenPose.dll) (in OpenPoseDemo.exe): 0xC0000005: An access violation occurred while reading the location 0x0000000000000008 <denchmark-h:h3>Type of issue</denchmark-h>
You might select multiple topics, delete the rest:
Compilation/installation error Execution error

comments.comment: This problem should be fixed now. Sorry for the bug! And please, let me know if it works now. Thanks!
